collections.description: Team: Racing Club de Avellaneda, also known as Racing Club or simply Racing, is an Argentine sports institution founded on March 25, 1903, located in the city of Avellaneda, in Buenos Aires. The colors that identify it are the celestial and the white in honor of the patriotic colors of the Argentine Republic. In the professional era started in 1931, he won many other Argentine championships. The experience will be unique at Avellaneda. Buy your Racing Club tickets with Football Host. Stadium: The Presidente Perón stadium is the second with more capacity in the country and is located on Omar Oreste Corbatta and Mozart streets, in the Avellaneda city in the south of Gran Buenos Aires. It has a capacity of 60.000 peolple. Enjoy the complete football experience. Choose your match, choose your host, get your Racing tickets and live with the local fans the pre-match, match and post-match!
collections.title: Racing Club Tickets & Experiences
collections.descriptionHtml:
Team:

Racing Club de Avellaneda, also known as Racing Club or simply Racing, is an Argentine sports institution founded on March 25, 1903, located in the city of Avellaneda, in Buenos Aires. The colors that identify it are the celestial and the white in honor of the patriotic colors of the Argentine Republic. In the professional era started in 1931, he won many other Argentine championships.

The experience will be unique at Avellaneda. Buy your Racing Club tickets with Football Host.

Stadium:

The Presidente Perón stadium is the second with more capacity in the country and is located on Omar Oreste Corbatta and Mozart streets, in the Avellaneda city in the south of Gran Buenos Aires. It has a capacity of 60.000 peolple.

Enjoy the complete football experience. Choose your match, choose your host, get your Racing tickets and live with the local fans the pre-match, match and post-match!
